title: C based light weight 2D game engine
description: Following the Handmade hero series, enabled me to create a Built a lightweight 2D game engine in C, implementing core systems including rendering, input handling, physics, and asset management. Designed modular architecture with efficient memory management and low-level optimizations for performance. Developed custom data structures to manage sprites, collisions, and game loops, ensuring smooth frame rates. Documented the engine and created sample demos to showcase functionality for future extensions and game development.
